alert.note: Alert for Bastrop; Caldwell; Guadalupe; Travis (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 24 at 1:58AM CST by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Caldwell, northeastern Guadalupe, southeastern Travis and central Bastrop Counties through 245 AM CST... At 158 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Staples, or 11 miles west of Luling, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... San Marcos, Kyle, Seguin, Lockhart, Bastrop, Luling, Smithville, Martindale, Uhland, Mustang Ridge, Kingsbury, Niederwald, Staples, Fentress, Cedar Creek, Rosanky, Zorn, Wyldwood, Camp Swift, and Upton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
